title: Blocked Road
subtitle: Meet Kai Chen about the request.

title: Thinning the Shots
subtitle: Ride to Landor's farm. Talk to Danny (optional).

title: Flower Basket
subtitle: Speak with Emily. Collect enough poppies for a bouquet.

title: Not-Easter Eggs
subtitle: Talk to Mrs. Wilson. Collect 10 eggs and deliver them to Kathy at the market.

title: Horse Brushing
subtitle: Go to the Equestrian Center, take a brush, and brush 3 horses.

title: Deer Footprints
subtitle: Mark the deer route (20 markers) and report to Kyle.

title: Horse Ointment
subtitle: Talk to Philip Wiseman, apply ointment to 3 horses, then report back.

title: Sheep Catcher
subtitle: Talk to Old Williams, touch the 7 sheep tracker, then return to him.

title: Deer Path
subtitle: Mark the deer route (22 markers) and report to Kyle.

title: Future Bread
subtitle: Talk to Kurt at the general store and deliver fertilizer to Dwight Collins.

title: Smells Like a Bun
subtitle: Pick up 2 wheat sacks from the wheat farm.

title: Clean and Fresh
subtitle: Ride to Wiseman's horse rehab and clean 5 stalls (manure).
